Seize the Day Action Planner was built for you to easily add your daily action items and feel a sense of accomplishment as you mark off your daily action items as complete.

Use Seize the Day Planner for Chrome to:
- Organize your day
- Add daily action items to track and complete
- Add websites as action items to visit later
- View your action progress on the day

Enjoy Seize the Day Action Planner and let's take action!
